description: This file implements the TR069Agent class, which provides methods to initialize, terminate, and handle various TR069 protocol operations such as getting and setting parameters, retrieving parameter names and attributes, and managing session lifecycle. It also includes external C functions for interacting with underlying systems.

classes.name: TR069Agent
classes.description: A class representing the TR069 protocol agent with methods for initialization, termination, and parameter management.

methods.name: std::string testmodulepre_requisites()
methods.description: Registers the agent with the system before tests run.

methods.name: bool testmodulepost_requisites()
methods.description: Unregisters the agent after tests complete.

methods.name: void TR069Agent_Init(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Initializes the TR069 agent session using ssp_register.

methods.name: void TR069Agent_GetParameterValues(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Retrieves the values of specified TR069 parameters.

methods.name: void TR069Agent_SetParameterValues(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Sets the values of specified TR069 parameters and validates the set operation.

methods.name: void TR069Agent_GetParameterNames(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Retrieves parameter names and compares with a given list to verify matching attributes.

methods.name: void TR069Agent_GetParameterAttr(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Fetches attributes of a specific parameter.

methods.name: void TR069Agent_SetParameterAttr(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Sets attributes for a specific parameter and validates the change.

methods.name: void TR069Agent_Terminate(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
bool initialize(IN const char * szVersion)
methods.description: Performs class-level initialization, registering wrapper functions.

ctags.pattern: /^void TR069Agent::TR069Agent_GetParameterNames(IN const Json::Value& req, OUT Json::Value& respon/

ctags.pattern: /^void TR069Agent::TR069Agent_SetParameterAttr(IN const Json::Value& req, OUT Json::Value& respons/
